dataIdInfo.idAbs: Calculates, for each stream network segment, discharge (in cubic feet per second) and stream power for both baseflow and annual peak streamflows. For help using this tool, check out the doumentation page.

tool.name: iHyd_tool

param.name: in_network
param.dialogReference: The BRAt Table output created in Step 2.

param.name: region
param.dialogReference: The iHyd.py script uses this number to identify if there are any existing regions in the script tht already have equations assigned to them.

param.name: Qlow_eqtn
param.dialogReference: The equation used to calcualte low flow. This must follow specific syntax, check the documentation page for more details.

param.name: Q2_eqtn
param.dialogReference: The equation used to calcualte high flow. This must follow specific syntax, check the documentation page for more details.

tool.summary: Calculates, for each stream network segment, discharge (in cubic feet per second) and stream power for both baseflow and annual peak streamflows. For help using this tool, check out the doumentation page.
